data.title: What religion was Norman Borlaug?
data.meta_description:
Most likely a Christian as in his Nobel Prize acceptance speech
he quoted The Bible 5 times

nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/peace/laureates/1970/borlaug-lecture.html
Wikipedia article says his grandparents helped start the
Immanuel Norwegian Evangelical Lutheran Congregation:
en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Borlaug
He served for 6 years as a trustee for the Christian non-profit
organization Bread for the World:
bread.org/press-room/releases/norman-borlaug.html

blog.christianitytoday.com/ctliveblog/archives/hunger_food_cri/
The current president of Bread for the World, Rev. Dr. David
Beckman, conducted his funeral:
myharlingennews.com/?p=2888
data.text:
Most likely a Christian as in his Nobel Prize acceptance speech he quoted The Bible 5 times

nobelprize.org/nobel_prizes/peace/laureates/1970/borlaug-lecture.html

Wikipedia article says his grandparents helped start the Immanuel Norwegian Evangelical Lutheran Congregation:

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Norman_Borlaug

He served for 6 years as a trustee for the Christian non-profit organization Bread for the World:
